titles.title: To extend the temporary reduction of duty on fine animal hair of Kashmir (cashmere) goats, processed beyond the degreased or carbonized condition.
To extend the temporary reduction of duty on fine animal hair of Kashmir (cashmere) goats, processed beyond the degreased or carbonized condition.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on fine animal hair of kashmir (cashmere) goats, processed beyond the degreased or carbonized condition.
